Articles.Content:
Here is a parody of the Dr. Mann part of Interstellar! But told from the perspective of Dr. Mann.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PgvTsMXxW6E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

This is the weirdest but funniest thing I have seen in ages!

+Rep, dude, you're funny!
Thank you! I hope Dr. Mann isn't lonely anymore.
